Park's Museum and Superintendent's Residence Re-stain Tender
--------------------------------------------

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
----------------------------------

Parks Canada is inviting experienced contractors to submit a proposal for re-staining two historically significant buildings in Banff National Park. The scope of work includes the exterior re-coating of the Banff Park Museum and the Superintendent's residence.

**Project Details:**
-----------------

*   Contract Value: Between $100,001 and $250,000 (inclusive)
*   Start Date: February 9th, 2024
*   End Date: August 1st, 2024

**Submissions:**
--------------

Submissions received via email, fax, or in-person will not be accepted. Only submissions sent via fax to 1-855-983-1808 or email to soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca will be considered official.

**Requirements:**
--------------

*   National Parks Regulations must be adhered to
*   Project value is estimated between $100,001 and $250,000
*   All work must be completed by August 1st, 2024

**Optional Site Visit:**
---------------------

The contracting authority recommends that bidders or their representatives attend an optional site visit on February 16th, 2024, at 10:00 am (MT). This visit will cover both the Banff Park Museum and the Superintendent's residence.

**Queries:**
---------

Queries of a technical and contractual nature must be written and submitted to the contracting authority at least five business days prior to the closing date for the tender.

**Documentation:**
----------------

The Request for Proposal document can be found on the Government of Canada's tendering service website at [insert link]. All bidders must obtain the Request for Proposal documents from this official source. 

Please refer to the National Parks Regulations for the complete requirements and terms for this project. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Important Date:**
-----------------

Tender Closing: February 29, 2024 at 16:00:00
